comments.body:
If we do:

```python
        list_artifact_dir_response_mock = mock.MagicMock
        list_artifact_dir_response_mock.status_code = 200
```

All mock instances have a `status_code` attribute, which may cause unexpected results.
I think this is an overkill but we could use the `ast` module and detect `mock.MagicMock`.

diffHunk:

        list_artifact_dir_response_mock = mock.MagicMock()
        list_artifact_dir_response_mock.status_code = 200
        list_artifact_dir_json_mock = {
            "files": [

            assert repo.databricks_profile_uri == MOCK_PROFILE
